question: The “Social Security Group Insurance Scheme” has been replaced with which among the following schemes?
explanation: Social Security Fund (SSF) was set up in 1988-89 for providing social security through Group Insurance Scheme to the weaker and vulnerable sections of the society. Social Security Group Insurance Scheme was administered by LIC but later, the scheme has been replaced by Janshree Bima Yojna from August 2000.JBY has replaced Social Security Group Insurance Scheme (SSGIS) and Rural Group Life Insurance Scheme (RGLIS).
